title: reconnect problem
body: i cannot reconnect to the game

replies.body: Hey sorry to hear.  If this is still happening, give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to help troubleshoot.  I also don't have a lot of visibility over EU, but I recommend checking your ISP's support page in case something might be going on.

same problem here
I think it has todo with sume/rwinter time, my brother has the same issue
